chapters.title: Chapter 3: The Amyrlin's Anger
chapters.info: Yukiri, p. 85—Sitter for the Gray Ajah. She was the daughter of an innkeeper, and is always the last Gray to join the Gray consensus in the Hall. She was an ally of Saerin and Pevara in hunting down Darkfriends in the Tower. She is one of the shortest people Egwene has ever met. She always seems to be in control. She is one of Egwene's most ardent supporters. See also Asnobar, Saerin; Herimon, Seaine; Tazanovni, Pevara.
